titleStmt.title: A platforme, made for the proofe of Gods prouidence that is, for examining of the truth of this doctrine, whether God by his prouidence rule all things generally, and euery creature and action particularly / by Arthur Dent.
titleStmt.author: Dent, Arthur, d. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ed. Allde for Henry Gosson, and are to be solde in Pater-noster-rowe, at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater-noster-rowe, at the signe of the Sunne
